name: Reference Number
title: REF NUM
definition: This field is used to identify a circuit or circuits segment on a request for multiple circuits.
usageNotes: Required when the RT field is “F”, and the second position of the TQ field on the ASR Form is not “N” or “X”.
Prohibited when the RT field is “B”.
fieldNotes: REF NUM may be used by the customer and the provider for control and tracking purposes during the provisioning process.
For each circuit segment the REF NUM must be unique beginning with “0001” and incrementing by one for each additional circuit segment.
